channel.title: Facts about the Black Mesa dev team.
channel.description:
Raminator can bend time and space at will but he prefers to spend his time making sure that his nose is always pretty at all times.
All of the dev team studied in the school of life and they all have a PHD in Kicking Your Ass.

item.title: Facts about the Black Mesa dev team.
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
I can’t get his site to load. Has he uploaded any new animations after the scientists failing on a stepladder?

edit: his site seems to be working now

Read full topic
item.source: Facts about the Black Mesa dev team.

item.title: Facts about the Black Mesa dev team.
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
I agree, they’re fucking awesome…

I wasn’t too keen on any of the animations concerning the scientists though… They just seem too cartoony for having such a realistic outward appearance. The way the guy in the Headcrab scene smashes the CRT on a HC… I just don’t like it. It’s like all the momentum is lost on impact. Needs moar of a bounce? (the arm pump was a bit too much too, maybe a fist shake instead? Doesn’t really matter) And the scientist that falls of the ladder gets up without seeming to regain balance at all (not to mention the fact that he didn’t look the least bit concerned that his colleague was being pulled into a ventilation shaft by god knows what). I hope those were wips. If not…bawwww…

.

But dat garg.

Read full topic
item.source: Facts about the Black Mesa dev team.

D::awesome:

Those are gorgeous, once again the Development team exceeds all my expectations.

I love the energy the Gargantua has. He’s like a super curious, man eating toddler.

item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
PlayerHater:

Was there something wrong with it that made you mess with it in the first place? Just curious here.

Besides it being a rather tall signature, no there was nothing wrong with it. I was just messing with him, but he didnt appreciate mah humor. :retard:

item.title: Facts about the Black Mesa dev team.
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

Short story:
I shrunk his siggy and messed up the transparency
He changed it to a “butt picture” that would normally result in a ban
I changed it to a “durr” link
He never came back.

:s hrug:

I suspect he is still here under a diff name. I don’t really care.

Oh,

Read full topic

item.title: Facts about the Black Mesa dev team.
item.dc:creator: Bossy
item.description:
Half-dude:

The Devs were actually employees of 3D Realms, that’s the reason there hasn’t been a mod update in so long, in 3DR fashion they know they can’t finish it but act like they can… Oh and they’re laid off now… so that’s funny too.

I like you, you say stuff everyone else thinks (but doesn’t post because it’s pretty retarded)

And your username indicates gender-confusion, which is always popular with catholics.

Read full topic

you’re lying
